line.text: Thy gift thy tables are within my brain
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*
s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Which shall above that idle rank remain
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Beyond all date even to eternity
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Or at the least so long as brain and heart
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Have faculty by nature to subsist
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Till each to razed oblivion yield his part
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Of thee thy record never can be missed
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: That poor retention could not so much hold
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Nor need I tallies thy dear love to score
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Therefore to give them from me was I bold
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: To trust those tables that receive thee more
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: To keep an adjunct to remember thee
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Were to import forgetfulness in me
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*
